SEARCH
Package view

Class PharmacistView

Object
PharmacistView
All Implemented Interfaces:
View
public class PharmacistView extends Object implements View
Represents the pharmacist's view in the Hospital Management System (HMS). This class implements the View interface Provides methods for managing inventory, viewing appointment outcomes, and updating prescription statuses.
Since:
2024-10-27
Version:
11.8
Author:
Goh Jun Keat

  • Constructor Details

    • PharmacistView

      public PharmacistView()
      Constructs a new PharmacistView instance.

  • Method Details

    • handleSubmitReplenishmentRequest

      public static void handleSubmitReplenishmentRequest()
      Handles the submission of a replenishment request for low-stock medications. Checks if low-stock items exist and if a request has already been submitted. If there are no medicines low in stock or if a request has already been submitted, a message is displayed. Otherwise, the low-stock medicines are displayed, and the user is prompted to submit a request.

    • handleSubmitRequest

      public static void handleSubmitRequest()
      Submits a request to replenish stock based on user confirmation. Prompts the user for confirmation to submit the request.

    • displayLowStockMeds

      public static void displayLowStockMeds()
      Displays a list of medications that are low in stock.

    • submittedRequest

      public static boolean submittedRequest()
      Checks if a replenishment request has already been submitted for low-stock items.
      Returns:
      true if all low-stock items have a pending request; false otherwise.

    • handleDisplayAppointmentOutcome

      public static void handleDisplayAppointmentOutcome()
      Displays appointment outcomes for patients. If no outcomes are stored, notifies the user.

    • handleUpdatePrescriptionStatus

      public static void handleUpdatePrescriptionStatus()
      Updates the prescription status of appointments with pending prescriptions. Allows the pharmacist to input an Appointment Outcome ID for updating.

    • printAppointmentOutcomesForPatients

      private static boolean printAppointmentOutcomesForPatients(boolean onlyPending)
      Prints appointment outcomes for patients.
      Parameters:
      onlyPending - if true, displays only pending appointments.
      Returns:
      true if appointment outcomes are found; false otherwise.

    • printViewMenu

      public void printViewMenu()
      Prints the pharmacist's menu options.
      Specified by:
      printViewMenu in interface View

    • handleView

      public void handleView()
      Handles user input and interactions for the pharmacist view. Prompts the user to select an option and processes it accordingly.
      Specified by:
      handleView in interface View

    • handleViewMedicationInventory

      public void handleViewMedicationInventory()
      Displays the medication inventory to the user.

    • viewTitle

      public void viewTitle()
      Prints the title of the pharmacist view.
      Specified by:
      viewTitle in interface View
